acf.title: Chief Executive Officer, APAC
acf.bio_copy:
Julia Raiskin is Chief Executive Officer, APAC. She is responsible for daily oversight and management of the region.

Prior to joining Millennium, Julia spent 16 years at Citi, most recently as Head of Markets for the Asia Pacific region, where she was responsible for developing and implementing product delivery strategies, leading senior regulatory relationships and establishing risk management discipline across the region. She served on Citi’s Global Markets and Asia Management Committees.

Before this role, she was Head of Equities, Asia, where she oversaw regulatory and restructuring projects and held a number of other regional roles in Asia. Prior to Citi, Julia was Head of European Corporate FX Sales for JPMorgan, where she managed a team responsible for FX coverage of European corporates across FX, EM and Commodities, and was responsible for Private Side FX & Commodity Origination at Morgan Stanley. Julia began her career as an Associate in Foreign Exchange Trading for Lehman Brothers in London.

Julia received a BA, with Highest Honors, from Harvard University and a D.Phil from Oxford University, where she was a Rhodes Scholar.
